snippet: New Yorkers need to know who is contributing millions to influence state politics.
abstract: Editorial asserts that the fact that New York Gov Andrew Cuomo has received sizable donations from the gambling industry and has also made expanding casino gambling a priority in his agenda underscores the necessity of ethics reform; urges Cuomo to demonstrate his commitment to reform by pushing the Committee to Save New York, a gambling industry trade group that has supported Cuomo, to reveal its donors; questions what else the organization does that allows it to claim tax-exempt status.
lead_paragraph: New Yorkers need to know who is contributing millions to influence state politics.
